name: Introduction to Psychology
description: An introductory survey of the basic principles of psychology, including topics such as the biological basis of behavior, learning, memory, perception, development, motivation, emotion, and social behavior.

name: Research Methods in Psychology
description: Introduction to the methods used by psychologists to conduct research. Topics include research design, data collection, analysis, and interpretation.

name: Cognitive Psychology
description: Exploration of the mental processes that underlie behavior, including attention, perception, memory, language, and problem-solving. Students will gain an understanding of the fundamental principles of cognitive psychology and their applications.
